content:
Russian invaders continue to fire the border areas of Chernihiv and Sumy regions. In total, 44 shelling (217 explosions) from different types of weapons were charged during the day.

About thisinformsOperational Command "North".

Four communities of Chernihiv region were under enemy shelling.

Semeniv community:

  • Book - 16 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm; 3 explosions, probably FPV-Dron.
  • Kostobor - 2 shelling: 7 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.

Snovsk community:

  • Mountain - 14 explosions, probably RSZV; 5 explosions, probably become artillery.

Gorodnyansk community:

  • Polesie - 40 explosions, probably RSZV.
  • Moshchenko - 2 shelling: 7 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Senkivka - 11 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.

Novgorod-Siversky community:

  • Mikhalchyna Sloboda - 10 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Pushkari - 2 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Red farm - 2 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Guy - 7 explosions, probably become artillery.

Four districts of Sumy region fired the enemy for the past day.

Sumy District:

  • Abundant - 1 explosion, probably dropping VP from UAV.
  • White - 3 explosions, probably mortar 120 mm; 8 explosions, probably a mortar 82 mm.
  • Basivka is 1 explosion, probably dropping the UAV.
  • Ugroids - 2 shelling: 7 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Novodmitrivka - 5 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Atine-2 shelling: 3 explosions, probably FPV-Dron.
  • Bilopillya - 3 explosions, probably room. The shelling damages the civilian infrastructure and about 20 private homes.
  • Iskryskivshchyna - 2 explosions, probably at the helicopter.
  • Cover - 2 explosions, probably discharge of UAV SVP; 4 shelling: 4 explosions, probably FPV-Dron; 4 explosions, probably mortar 120 mm.

Okhtyr District:

  • Dmitrivka-3 shelling: 5 explosions, probably FPV-Dron.
  • Great Pisarivka-1 explosion, probably FPV-Dron; 2 explosions, probably room.
  • Popivka - 8 explosions, probably at the helicopter; 2 shelling: 2 explosions, probably FPV-Dron; 10 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Lugovka - 3 explosions, probably RSZV.
  • Oleksandrivka - 4 explosions, probably mortar 120 mm.

Konotop District:

  • Boyar-leather-8 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.

Shostka district:

  • Old Huta - 7 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.

Information on the destruction, dead or injured among the local population is specified.

As reported by the Armyinform, Kharkiv region under fire:15 settlements suffered artillery and mortar attacks.

Recall the air forces knocked down all12 "Shahaneda"by which Russia attacked Ukraine.
title: More than 200 explosions occurred at the Sumy and Chernihiv border and Chernihiv region
description: About it reports the operational command "North". Four communities of Chernihiv region ...
author: Army Inform
